Feb. 23, 2019 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (Unregistered Section)

Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Best instrumentalist: Euphonium, Reading Spring Gardens
Special Awards (Saturday) Best Percussion of the Day: Olney Brass (3rd section) Best Bass Section of the Day: Brunel Brass (1st section) Best Cornet of the Day: Olney Brass (3rd section) Best Tenor Horn of the Day: Michelmersh Silver Band (1st section)
Special Prizes (Whole Contest) Band with the most Under 19 Players: Great Western Youth Band (4th section) Youngest Player of the Weekend: Lyla Ellis, age 9, Yarnton Band
